name: Absolute Zero (itch) (KevZ3742)
description:
--

Quick Platformer Made in 2 Days for The Great Testing Jam

In Absolute Zero, you play as an Ice Wizard capable of freezing and unfreezing water in order to platform to the end of the level.

There are currently 3 levels as of this build.

Controls:
- A/D - Move Left/Right
- W/Space - Jump
- E - Interact
- Mouse - Aim
- LMB - Shoot
- 1 - Health Potion
- 2 - Rage Potion
- 3 - Speed Potion
- 4 - Jump Potion

Team:
- Kevin Zhang
- Will Wang
